price: Dan mereka adakan (hubungan) nasab antara Allah dan antara jin.  Dan sesungguhnya jin mengetahui bahwa mereka benar-benar akan diseret (ke neraka),
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ بَيۡنَهُۥ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ نَسَبٗاۚ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمَتِ ٱلۡجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū baynahu wabayna al-jinati nasaban walaqad ʿalimati al-jinatu innahum lamuḥ'ḍarūna
